channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Meat Monday is Back! | June 9
item.description: Join the CCPD & MANE for a sizzling summer kickoff! | Date: June 9, 2025 | Time: 11:30 AM – 2 PM | Location: DCC Courtyard. Enjoy delicious grilled meats alongside a variety of gluten-free, dairy-free, and vegan sides—plus a tasty meat substitute option for our plant-based friends! Come hungry and bring your friends—there’s something for everyone!
item.author: Students

item.title: Bus to Albany Pride | June 8
item.description:
Date: Sunday, June 8, 2025 11:00 AM - 4:30 PM - Please visit recwell.rpi.edu or reach out to maner@rpi.edu for more information.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
